update.foreach: UPDATE SYS_L_IP_ADDRESSES SET DELETED_FLAG = '1' WHERE IP =#{item}

UPDATE SYS_L_IP_ADDRESSES SET DELETED_FLAG = '1' WHERE DELETED_FLAG = '0'
AND ${item.RECORD_CON} = #{item.RECORD_VALUES}
